fullplot: Love, food, sex and death mix together in an explosive cocktail when a mechanic (Fèbregas) takes his family (old granny Sara Garcèa included) to attend a car race. The innocent picnic becomes a feast, but then the old granny dies.
plot: A mechanic takes his family to a car race and a series of events occur which brings problems, betrayals, violence and the unexpected death of an elderly person.
title: National Mechanics
